item.title: new attempt with syntax highlightening
item.description: this is to get zenburn syntax highlighting to work. yes. it works. library(tidyverse) ## -- Attaching packages ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ tidyverse 1.2.1 -- ## v ggplot2 3.2.1.9000 v purrr 0.3.2 ## v tibble 2.1.3 v dplyr 0.8.3 ## v tidyr 1.0.0 v stringr 1.4.0 ## v readr 1.3.1 v forcats 0.4.0 ## -- Conflicts --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- tidyverse_conflicts() -- ## x dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter() ## x dplyr::lag() masks stats::lag() summary(diamonds) ## carat cut color clarity ## Min.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is a new R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.
